name: Cleaner UI for Gmail
description: An improved version of guari's "Clean UI for Gmail."  This version does not require the 'Gmelius" extension.  It unifies color schemes (particularly for those who do not use tabs), recolors the titlebar checkbox, and improves the style and positioning of various elements throughout the site.  Tag: Material Design
additional_info: Don't use this style with the chat sidebar.  I have it disabled, and don't feel like going back and fixing the mass amount of red it has at the moment.
